features.title: Made for people.
features.featureText: Connect with the right people. Find what you need to and automatize everything else.That is how it works in Slack. Your own productive platform.
features.subText: Slack can be used totally for free during the time that you need it to.
features.brands: Aproved by companies all over the world

collaboration.title: Colaboration
collaboration.circlesText: Assemble meeting with audio and video

knowledge.title: Knowledge
knowledge.filesSharingText: Bring your files to the work flow

enterprisePlatform.title: Enterprise platform
enterprisePlatform.iaText: Simple and intuitive AI, where your are already working at
enterprisePlatform.securityText: Protect your data and ensure conformity
enterprisePlatform.atlasText: Descubra os mapas de perfis e organizacao

productivityComponent.title: Reach all the necessities of your organization with powerfull productivity tools
list: Automate routine tasks and dedicate your time to more important ones.
See what happens in all your organization with the easier that Slack Atlas will bring. Our directory integration tool for teams.
Visualize the productivity of your workteam and measure its adhesion to the technological pile with advanced data analysis.
productivityComponent.subTitle: Get know more about Large Scale Slack.
productivityComponent.quote: “Slack has been the hammer that helps us to break silo's walls. It is the operational system of collaboration in 194 countries and 171 offices. Gathering us like nothing ever had done before.”
productivityComponent.signature: Executive Vice-president. Operation media and transmissions

companiesFeatures.title: Performance and productivity for all levels of your company.
companiesFeatures.text: Upscale processes, ensure the conformity of all your company and maximize the adhesion to the technological pile - Everything with Slack!
